title: Disappearing loot
body: Opened the chest with the key and I got a teemo skin but it is nowhere to be found. I'm a little confused it said added to inventory but i went into my inventory and nada.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Try restarting your client, sometimes certain pages won't display correctly until you've done this.

Did you activate a trial on the skin/upgrade it? That would remove the skin from your hextech inventory.

If nothing above answers your question, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support.
